mapper.select: SELECT MCLI.MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM_ID, MCLC.NAME AS categoryName, MCLI.ITEM AS itemName, MCLI.STATUS FROM MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM MCLI JOIN MY_CHECK_LIST_CATEGORY MCLC ON MCLI.MY_CHECK_LIST_CATEGORY_ID = MCLC.MY_CHECK_LIST_CATEGORY_ID WHERE MCLI.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MCLI.IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY MCLI.MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM (MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM_ID, MEMBER_ID, MY_CHECK_LIST_CATEGORY_ID, ITEM) VALUES (SEQ_MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM_ID.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{myCheckListCategoryId}, #{item})
mapper.update: UPDATE MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM SET STATUS = CASE WHEN STATUS = 'UNCHECKED' THEN 'CHECKED' WHEN STATUS = 'CHECKED' THEN 'UNCHECKED' END, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM_ID = #{myCheckListItemId} AND IS_DELETED = 0
UPDATE MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM SET IS_DELETED = 1, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM_ID = #{myCheckListItemId}
UPDATE MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM SET MY_CHECK_LIST_CATEGORY_ID = #{myCheckListCategoryId}, ITEM = #{item}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MY_CHECK_LIST_ITEM_ID = #{myCheckListItemId}
